parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> [[Eden Editor: Connecting|Connect]] entities together.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''add3DENConnection''' [type, from, to]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - connection class from ''Cfg3DEN >> Connections''
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> from: [[Array]] of [[Eden Entity|Eden Entities]] - entities which are being connected
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> to: [[Eden Entity]]- entity to which entities will be connected to
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if the connection was made

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[add3DENConnection]] ["RandomStart",[[get3DENSelected]] "Object","marker_0"]</code>
Set random start on marker "marker_0" for all selected objects.

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> 
[[remove3DENConnection]]
[[get3DENConnections]]
</value></part></template></root>
